title: God Bless Football: Aaron Rodgers, Tim Tebow, Kurt Angle and Dan Le Batard!
description:
Dan Le Batard joins GBF to reunite with Aaron Rodgers and to discuss Aaron passing the torch to Tua. Stugotz and Billy pitch Tim Tebow some ideas for how UF could honor him. Mike Golic tells us how his golf cart was "stolen". Chris Simms gets us ready for week 3. Kurt Angle and Gordie Gronk join, Mojo, Joba, K-Funk and Chris to pick some NFL games.
Learn more about your ad choices. Visit megaphone.fm/adchoices
